name: Small Threat
description:
Originally made for:  BrackeysGameJam2020.2

[NOTE: currently there is a bug where the player gets stuck with the level. I'm on it, but if it happens to you, just press the 'jump button' or SPACE]

50 years ago a virus took humanity unaware. Now, it is time to go back in time to amend this... you have to save the human race.

Use "A" and "D" to move and "SPACE BAR" to jump. Controller allowed.

Credits:

  • Background Tiles:  www.gamedeveloperstudio.com
  • Art & Coding : Adrián Martínez (Mivermyr)
  • Music: María Ajenjo
